price: «ሙሳ ሆይ! አላህን በግልጽ እስከምናይ ድረስ ላንተ በፍጹም አናምንልህም» በላችሁም ጊዜ (አስታውሱ)፡፡ እናንተም እየተመለከታችሁ መብረቅ ያዘቻችሁ፡፡
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡتُمۡ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ نَرَى ٱللَّهَ جَهۡرَةٗ فَأَخَذَتۡكُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'tum yāmūsā lan nu'mina laka ḥattā narā al-laha jahratan fa-akhadhatkumu al-ṣāʿiqatu wa-antum tanẓurūna
